* created_date

* event_id, state_id

* RDM-6916 Create indexes for CaseEvent table (#869)

* RDM-6916 Create indexes for CaseEvent table

  [RDM-6916] (https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-6916)

Create indexes for CaseEvent table to improve query performance:
* Conditional DROP followed by CREATE of idx_case_event_created_date.
* Creation new indexes for:
  * case_type_id
  * event_id, state_id

* RDM-6916 Create indexes for CaseEvent table

  [RDM-6916](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-6916)

Switch build script to use separate SQL statements using IF NOT EXISTS.

Creates new indexes for:
* created_date
* case_type_id
* event_id, state_id
